c)	Continuity	of	Midwifery	
Carer
Continuity of Midwifery Carer 
is a model where you will have 
a named midwife, who with 
the support of a small team, 
will work together to provide 
all of your care during your 
pregnancy, birth and after your 
baby is born.
This means you are much more 
likely to have the same midwife 
during your pregnancy who you 
get to know and have a trusting 
relationship with.
Benefits	of	Continuity	of	
Midwifery Carer
There is
